Package propra22.q8493367.draw.view

Class DrawPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
propra22.q8493367.draw.view.DrawPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible, IDrawPanel
public class DrawPanel extends JPanel implements IDrawPanel
This Class represents the draw panel. The points and all the shapes like the convex hull, the diameter, the quadrangle, the triangle and the animation are displayed on the draw panel. Next to the functionality for the interaction with the user it also provides a panning and a zoom functionality.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • DrawPanel

      public DrawPanel(IPointSet pointSet, IHull hull, IDiameter diameter, IQuadrangle quadrangle, TangentPair tangentPair, QuadrangleSequence quadrangleSequence)
      Instantiates a new draw panel.
      Parameters:
      pointSet - - the point set
      hull - - the convex hull
      diameter - - the diameter
      quadrangle - - the biggest quadrangle
      tangentPair - - the tangent pair needed by the animation
      quadrangleSequence - - the sequence of quadrangles needed by the animation

    • center

      public void center()
      Initializes the draw panel when a point set is loaded from file. The inner offsets for x and y coordinates and the scale are calculated so that the point set is displayed centered on the draw panel.
